resources.string:
Post-matric scholarship to the students falling under RBA/SC/ST/ Minority and Physically challenged persons category are sanctioned by the Social Welfare Department of the Government of The students falling under such categories are required to submit the prescribed forms along with fee details, relevant income and category certificates issued by the Tehsildar concerned to the Convenor Scholarships and Financial Assistance Committee as and when the notice inviting such forms is issued during the mid-session. The students are advised to apply for issuance of category and income certificates to the Tehsildar concerned, so that they are able to apply for these scholarships on time. Moreover Ministry of Human Resource Development also pays scholarship to the students showing extra ordinary performance in studies and hailing from “Bad Pockets” as described in SRO 249.
The college also provides financial assistance to the underprivileged and needy students from its limited resources, however the students qualifying for postmatric scholarship of Social Welfare Department are not considered for any financial support under this scheme
